name: 梁曉帆
objective: 人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
schedule:
Week 01:Introduction
Week 02:Methods
Week 03:Perception and Cognition
Week 04:Perception and Cognition
Week 05:Perception and Cognition
Week 06:Display

Week 08:Control

Week 10: Display-revisit

Week 12: Physical Work & MMH
Week 13: Motor Skills
Week 14: Applied Anthropometry
Week 15: Hand Tools & Devices
Week 16: Human Errors 
Week 17: System Design
Week 18:Final / 期末考
materials: Human Factors in Engineering & Design, by Sanders et al., 導讀：王明揚等(東華/新月圖書)
